name: BeepBoop Adventure
description:
BeepBoop Adventure is a 3D collect-a-thon platformer game
that takes place in a dirty polluted land.

You will embody a small robot called BeepBoop and
have to explore this forgotten land to find a way to get out!
Explore 4 levels and collect the 5 batteries scattered in the game!

KEYBOARD

W A S D to move
SPACE to jump
F to interact
MOUSE to move the camera

(XBOX) CONTROLLER

LEFT STICK to move
A to jump
B to interact
RIGHT STICK to move the camera

MINIMUM REQUIREMENT

OS: Windows 7/8/10/11
Processor: intel Core I5
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 Max-Q
Storage: 1,5 GB available space

RECOMMENDED REQUIREMENT

OS: Windows 7/8/10/11
Processor: Intel Core I7
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
Storage: 1,5 GB available space

CREDITS

Musics are from Antibirth's The Binding of Isaac mod soundtrack by Mudeth

THIS PROJECT HAS BEEN MADE IN 5 WEEKS ON UNREAL 5
